text: [Chapter 07] [Cos Path, Territory of Cos]

speaker: left
text: There's a member of the Elemental Offense Squad at a village we'll be passing by.

speaker: left
text: It will be important that we have enough power to stop any evil which may be at The Nation of Altar.
[Obscure Village, Territory of Cos]
???: So, you guys are heading to Altar?
???: I just finished a mission in Quad so I'll be able to help you if you need it.
[Recruit ????] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit
???: Got it.
[Wodahs has joined your party]

speaker: left
text: We're almost at Altar, but there's some bandits up ahead.
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Hello, Bladen.

speaker: right
text: Hey.

speaker: left
text: Bladen, you said your cousin lives in the Nation of Altar, yes?

speaker: right
text: Yeah, he lives at the Altar Temple.

speaker: left
text: The Altar Temple, huh. He must be pretty important to be living there.

speaker: right
text: He's the head of defense at the temple, he guards the valuables and such.

speaker: left
text: I wonder how he deals with all of the pressure of such an important job...

speaker: left
text: I come from a noble Sine family, and my parents expect me to do something grand.

speaker: left
text: But how am I suppposed to fix our current political situation?

speaker: left
text: Ever since my parent's involvement in the Quad Genocide became known, they've kept expecting more and more of me...

speaker: left
text: It's not my fault that they wanted to make some money by investing in the genocide following the economic recession from the...

speaker: left
text: ...western territories' involvement with the unauthorized voyages to the Forbidden Sea, which led to the Minor Civil War of 1282 AN.

speaker: left
text: Why don't they just not get involved in the genocide and just do some stocks or something?

speaker: left
text: Don't you think that would be safer both financially and socially?

speaker: right
text: I don't care.

speaker: right
text: I was paid to take you paying fools to Altar, where you will probably die to the defenses.

speaker: right
text: I could not care less about the economic affairs of the Sine nobility.

speaker: right
text: If you have nothing relevant to say, then leave me alone.
[Healia and Bladen leveled up!]
